abstract: Apple demonstrated a multiplayer games feature and a long-awaited “cut, copy and paste” function.
snippet: Apple demonstrated a multiplayer games feature and a long-awaited “cut, copy and paste” function.
lead_paragraph: CUPERTINO, Calif. — In a shot across the bow of other mobile phone makers that are rushing to emulate aspects of its popular iPhone, Apple on Tuesday previewed some features that are due out in the next version of the phone’s software.

headline.main: Apple Shows Off Next Version of iPhone Software

abstract: Apple’s new iPhone software encourages paid applications that offer to sell users more content for an additional fee. But it’s keeping free apps from doing the same thing.
snippet: Apple’s new iPhone software encourages paid applications that offer to sell users more content for an additional fee. But it’s keeping free apps from doing the same thing.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:30 p.m.  A few more comments added to the end
